ygData.subject: Re: request for comment: HOWTO twist
ygData.msgSnippet: Dang man the page looks great. You sure did put alot of work into it. My congradulations on the layout. I think it will help out alot of newbies. with your
ygData.messageBody:
Dang man the page looks great. You sure did put alot of work into it. My
congradulations on the layout. I think it will help out alot of newbies.
with your permission i would like to link that page to mine. I am working on
adding a bunch of Bard information to my page.
Taerian Valmont of Povar
----- Original Message -----
From: G.W. Willman, IV <gww6e@...>
To: eqbards <eqbards@onelist.com>
Sent: Sunday, November 21, 1999 7:49 PM
Subject: [eqbards] request for comment: HOWTO twist


> From: "G.W. Willman, IV" <gww6e@...>
>
> Hey all,
> After numerous times explaining twisting to both my party and to
fellow
> bards, I decided to write a little HOWTO. Before I submit it to the
regular
> EQ sites I'd really like to have everyone's inputs, comments and feedback.
>
> http://users.erols.com/gww6e/eq/HOWTO-twist-bard-songs.html
>
> Thanks,
> -GW
> <Tork@Nameless>
>
> > Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to lol@...
with the subject submissions.
>
